title: Dictionary to List
description: In Python, a dictionary is a collection of key-value pairs. Sometimes, we may need to convert a dictionary to a list of tuples. In this challenge, you are tasked with writing a function that takes a dictionary as an argument and returns a list of tuples.

meta.title: Convert Python Dictionary to List of Tuples
meta.description: Learn how to convert a Python dictionary to a list of tuples using a simple function.
meta.keywords: python, list, dictionary, data conversion, tuple

verify.name: Verify Python Script Execution in Temporary Directory
